name: droplet blanket
notes:
materials

- 7 (12) skeins of purl soho’s [santolina][1], 70% organically grown cotton, 20% rayon from bamboo, and 10% hemp. each skein is 328 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 2000 (3640) total yards required. we used the color golden pollen.
- us 6 (4 mm), 40- or 47-inch [circular needles][2]

gauge
20 stitches and 24 rows = 4 inches in 3 x 1 rib (see notes) with yarn doubled

sizes
crib (throw)

finished dimensions: approximately 30 (41) inches wide x 44 (58) inches long

sample: we knit the throw size.

designed for purl soho by [ksenia naidyon][3], the talented designer behind [life is cozy][4], where she shares patterns for her beautiful hand knits, instructions for must-know stitch patterns, and reviews on needles, books, and notions… everything we knitters love!
